mapper.select: select value ShowCnt from t_sys_region where id = '9999'
select picture_path slideshowPath, goods_id goodsId from t_sys_carousel_figure where picture_status = 1 and is_deleted = 0 and now() between time_start and time_end order by sort_id asc

select a.goods_id goodsId, b.goods_name goodsName, b.goods_picture goodsImagePath, b.sales_price goodsPrice from t_sys_hotgoods a, t_sys_goodsinfo b where a.goods_id = b.goods_id and a.is_deleted = 0 order by a.sort_id asc limit #{ShowCnt}
